matching.case_handling: Lowercase all input commands before matching (e.g., command = command.lower())

guidelines: Escape backslashes in JSON strings (e.g., \\ for a single backslash in regex).
Anchor with \b for word boundaries when needed.
Prefer specific patterns to reduce false positives (e.g., include concrete switches).
Group common rules under Cross-Platform; OS-specific rules live under their OS block.
